name: Tshirt
details: Casual, comfortable top for children, usually made of cotton or a cotton-poly blend, various sizes.

name: Trousers
details: Comfortable, durable pants for children, often made of cotton or denim, various styles and sizes.

name: Frock
details: A type of dress, typically knee-length or longer, with a skirt and often sleeves.

name: Shirt
details: Colorful, fun, and comfortable tops for boys and girls, various styles, sizes, and fabrics available.

name: Skirt
details: Feminine and stylish bottom wear, available in various lengths, patterns, and materials, for all ages.

name: Crop Top
details: Trendy, midriff-baring blouse worn with low-rise pants, skirts, or shorts for a stylish, casual look.

name: Maxi
details: Comfortable, flowy, and adorable maxi dresses for girls, perfect for casual everyday wear.

name: Jeans
details: Classic, versatile, and comfortable denim pants for men, women, and kids, suitable for all occasions.
